titles.title: To require that printing for the executive and legislative branches of the Government be procured through a competitive bid process conducted by the Administrator of General Services.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Operations.
Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Personnel and Police.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security.

bill.summary: 11/22/1993--Introduced. Requires that all printing for the executive and legislative branches, except that involving classified information, be procured through a competitive bid process conducted by the Administrator of General Services.
